learning_guide_2::text_card_1::text: Nivyiza. Ubu rero twongereko amasanamu mugukomeza inkuru yuwo muntu hamwe n’uduce twamasanamu wongereko igikorwa hamwe n’ingaruka.
learning_guide_2::title: Ongera ivyankenegwa ku nkuru yawe.
learning_guide_2::milestone_card_0::head: Igikurikira
learning_guide_2::text_card_2::text: Gukora inkuru mwiyumviriye mu cigwa ca mbere.shingiro 1.fata amasanamu abiri akurikira hama musubiremwo inkuru yose.
learning_guide_2::clip_audio_1::goals[0]: Fata ijwi uwo muntu ariko akora igikorwa kijanye n’inkuru.
learning_guide_2::clip_audio_2::goals[0]: Fata ijwi y’ingaruka y’igikorwa c’uwo muntu.
learning_guide_2::selfeval_card_0::text: Mbega urukurikirane rwamasanamu yawe mashasha ruravuga inkuru isorongoye.
learning_guide_2::text_card_0::text: Aha ni ya masanamu atatu mwakoze mu cigwa ca mbere. Ishingiro 1
learning_guide_2::clip_photo_2::goals[0]: Erekana ingaruka y’ico uwo muntu akoze.
learning_guide_2::markdown_card_1::text:
## Akazi keza.
Story Makerifise ivyigwa vyinshi bibafasha kwiga neza cane kubijanye niyo nzira.
learning_guide_2::text_card_3::text: Shira murutonde amasanamu yawe mugushikiriza inkuru yawe wongeyeko n’insiguro zirengako.
learning_guide_2::markdown_card_0::text:
## Mukugira inkuru ikwiye kandi isiguye neza bisaba kenshi amasanamu arenga atatu.uretse ko ushobora gukoresha amasanamu kenshi yuwo muntu kenshi ibikorwa n’ingaruka, inkuru nyishi biraza kabiri karenga.
Ikibanza
Nimba umuntu azoba ari mubibanza vyinshi koresha amasanamu yaho hantu azoba ari hose kugira werekane iryo hindagurika ry’ikibanza    
insiguro 
urashobora kwerekana ikintu nyamukuru c’uwo muntu canke c’inkuru yawe .amasanamu amasanamu asigura neza niyo shingiro y’inkuru yawe.
learning_guide_2::intro_card_0::headline: Ongera ivyankenegwa ku nkuru yawe.
learning_guide_2::clip_audio_3::goals[0]: Fata amajwi y’ikintu gihambaye kuri wa muntu wawe.
